title: DRSHANKs
author: DRSHANKs
content: DR. SHANK'S EAGLES 🦅 ARE LANDING THIS SUMMERDr. Shank’s Eagles NFTs are one of the first non-fungible tokens for the game of Golf ⛳. By purchasing unique and truly awesome Dr. Shank’s Eagles NFT art, you can stand a chance to win ETH. Here’s all you need to know about Dr. Shank’s Eagles NFTs, including how to participate in it.✦✦✧✦✦✦✧✦✦✦✧✦✦ What are Dr. Shank’s Eagles NFTs? ✦✦✧✦✦✦✧✦✦✦✧✦✦  Dr. Shank, a true lover, supporter and fan of Golf, has launched 9,999 unique and charismatic Eagles art inspired by his favorite sport. And now, he is willing to sell these Eagles NFTs to the true fans of golf around the world, as well as give them a chance to win ETH.Around 2,000 of Dr. Shank’s Eagles NFTs represent golf professionals playing on the PGA, LPGA, European Tour and/or Ladies European Tour, and the remaining Eagles represent other exciting things. When you purchase a Dr. Shank’s Eagles NFT, you also receive all the associated rights as well as stand to receive rewards for the associated professional.✦✦✧✦✦✦✧✦✦✦✧✦✦ How it works ✦✦✧✦✦✦✧✦✦✦✧✦✦Each season, Dr. Shank will select his favorite tournaments, and based on the results, the holder of winning Eagles (NFTs) will be rewarded with Ethereum.Rewards will be offered for the following golf tournaments:1. Top 10 Men's Tournaments by Total Purse2. Top 10 Women's Tournaments by Total Purse3. PGA LPGA European Tour And Ladies European Tour✦✦✧✦✦✦✧✦✦✦✧✦✦ How to participate ✦✦✧✦✦✦✧✦✦✦✧✦✦In order to participate to earn ETH, all you have to do is buy Dr. Shank’s Eagles NFTs and then patiently wait for the results of the selected tournaments. If you hold a winning player (Eagle), you’ll receive ETH.Based on where your player ends up in the final ranking of the tournament, you can receive the following rewards:✪ 1st place: 3% of the total available reward pool (ETH)✪ 2nd place: 2% of the total available reward pool (ETH)✪ 3rd place: 1% of the total available reward pool (ETH)✦✦✧✦✦✦✧✦✦✦✧✦✦ More about Dr. Shank’s Eagles (NFTs) ✦✦✧✦✦✦✧✦✦✦✧✦✦There are a total of 9,999 Eagles featuring unique 2D designs and with about 60 different assets mixed up. Each Eagle NFT is different from the other and all are non-fungible and non-interchangeable.All Eagles NFTs are based on the Ethereum blockchain (ERC 721). By purchasing and owning one of Dr. Shank’s Eagles, you also get access to the most exclusive Golf community online.We are in the process of becoming the first-ever Metaverse for golf.✦✦✧✦✦✦✧✦✦✦✧✦✦ What else do you get? ✦✦✧✦✦✦✧✦✦✦✧✦✦Each Dr. Shank’s Eagles NFT represents a real golf professional playing in a top tournament. For every game they win, the NFT holder will receive ETH rewards. In addition, all buyers and owners of Dr. Shank’s Eagles NFTs will receive exclusive merchandising of Dr. Shank, created for golf players and fans. These include branded golf balls, Dr. Shank’s golf cap, polo hoodie, and branded tripod bag.Here’s how to win Dr. Shank’s Golf merchandise for free:Just buy Dr. Shank’s Eagles NFTs. You’ll receive free merchandise for the purchase of two or more NFTs:✪ Buy 2 NFTs -  get a set of 3 branded premium balls✪ Buy 3 NFTs - get your unique dr. shank's cap✪ Buy 2 NFTs - get your premium combo polo hoodie✪ Buy 2 NFTs - get a unique brand tripod golf bagDr. Shank’s Eagles NFT launch is expected in 2022. The official website is already live and can be accessed at https://drshank.io.✦✦✧✦✦✦✧✦✦✦✧✦✦ Social Media ✦✦✧✦✦✦✧✦✦✦✧✦✦✫✫✫ FACEBOOK ✫✫✫ TWITTER ✫✫✫ TELEGRAM ✫✫✫✫✫✫ LINKEDIN ✫✫✫ INSTAGRAM ✫✫✫ DISCORD ✫✫✫ REDDIT ✫✫✫
